name.zh: 儿童翻盖迷你托特双肩包（多花型）

description.en: A cute mini tote-style backpack for kids featuring a flap closure and playful patterns. Includes a roomy main compartment, comfortable straps, and an easy-grab top handle—great for school and day trips. OEM/ODM customization available for prints, fabrics (including recycled options), colorways, logo patch, lining, pockets, closure hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 儿童翻盖迷你托特双肩包，造型可爱，花型活泼。翻盖闭合，主仓空间充足，带顶部提手与双肩背带，适合上学与出游。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：花型印花、面料（可选再生环保材料）、配色、Logo 工艺、内里、口袋结构、扣件五金与包装等。

en: Outer: Polyester / Nylon / canvas-like fabric (customizable; recycled options available)
Straps: Adjustable backpack straps + top carry handle (customizable)
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：涤纶/尼龙/类帆布面料（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
花型：数码印花/条纹面料（可定制）
闭合方式：按扣/磁吸扣（可定制）
背负：可调节肩带 + 顶部提手（可定制）

en.Organization: Main compartment + inner pocket (optional) + small front/side pocket (optional)
en.Customization: Prints, fabric, color, logo, lining, pocket layout, closure hardware, packaging

zh.收纳结构: 主仓 + 内袋（可选）+ 小前袋/侧袋（可选）
zh.背负方式: 双肩背负 + 顶部提手
zh.可定制: 花型印花、面料配色、Logo、内里、口袋结构、扣件五金、包装
